So a couple of weeks ago we were in Santiago,

looking empanada place.

So we found this empanada shop.

establishment but we managed to place our
order.

empanada.

They only have these two varieties.
You either get your pino beef or your cheese.

So it is a very small selection but I think
that means they really know how to make a
good empanada.
